description: Discover the best hotels in Cairns, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Pullman Cairns Escape Just Steps from Reef Fleet Terminal with Rooftop Pool & Four Dining Venues
hotels.description: With views over Trinity Inlet and the wonder of the Great Barrier Reef easily accessible just offshore from departures at Reef Fleet Terminal, this seaside haven invites you to experience one of the East Coast’s most sought-after destinations. Indulge in fresh local produce at Tamarind or experience dishes inspired by Southeast Asian flavours at Soy Kitchen Street Food. If you can tear yourself away from the hotel, a natural playground awaits on your doorstep, from snorkelling and diving to day trips among the nearby rainforests of Kuranda and the Daintree.

hotels.title: Pullman Cairns Oasis near Marina & Esplanade with Onsite Restaurant & Day Spa
hotels.description: A sun-dappled deck, bobbing yachts in the harbour, mountain vistas and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef on the doorstep … there’s no better place to take in the beauty of Tropical North Queensland than with a stay at Pullman Cairns International. Be sure to make use of the gleaming swimming pool, sleek day spa and fitness centre, and dine at one of Cairns’ best seafood restaurants - Coco’s Kitchen + Bar - also host to divinely decadent high tea. Plus, this tropical oasis is located just a short walk from the Reef Fleet Terminal and an easy stroll to the vibrant Esplanade.

hotels.title: Cairns Esplanade Oasis with Lagoon-Style Pool & City's Highest Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Experience the tropical allure of Cairns from the luxury of the five-star Riley by Crystalbrook Collection. Ideally located on the Esplanade, the hotel is just a short stroll from the vibrant dining and shopping precinct. Savour innovative flavours at Paper Crane or enjoy a cocktail at Rocco, Cairns' highest rooftop bar. Explore the nearby Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest, or simply relax by the spectacular lagoon pool.

hotels.title: Five-Star Crystalbrook Cairns Escape with Sea Views, Glass Swimming Pool & Day Spa
hotels.description: Set on the iconic Cairns Lagoon, this designer retreat is all about laidback luxury. A social butterfly on the edge of the iconic Esplanade, with impossibly turquoise harbour and Coral Sea views, this distinctive designer retreat features stylish interiors with two shimmering glass pools and an array of world-class dining options. Feel like you’re at the centre of the action and get lost in the kaleidoscopic beauty of the nearby UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef.

hotels.title: Cairns Esplanade Escape Overlooking the Coral Sea
hotels.description: Craving a trip to the tropics? Look no further than Rydges Esplanade Resort Cairns, boasting a picture-perfect location on the iconic Cairns Esplanade and easy access to the Great Barrier Reef cruise terminals. This stylish property places everything you need at your fingertips, and when you're ready to return to your Cairns base, enjoy the use of the three tropical swimming pools and two tennis courts. Throughout your stay, be sure to catch the sunset over the Coral Sea from one of the many restaurants and bars near the water, or visit the region's must-see sights, including Kuranda Scenic Railway and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Daintree Rainforest

hotels.title: Five-Star Cairns Oasis with Rooftop Pool, Pet-Friendly Rooms & Art Inspired Decor
hotels.description: Experience the artistic soul of Cairns with a stay at this exquisite and modern sanctuary in the heart of the city's vibrant arts precinct. This contemporary retreat offers easy access to the Cairns Performing Arts Centre, local galleries and the bustling Esplanade. Savour locally sourced dishes at the hotel's three unique eateries, including the chic CC's Bar and Grill, or explore the city's thriving food scene. For a change of pace, venture to the Great Barrier Reef or Daintree Rainforest for unforgettable natural encounters.

hotels.title: Modern Cairns Esplanade Escape with Rooftop Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Venture to Far North Queensland and experience a stay to remember at Oaks Cairns Hotel, perfectly located on the bustling Cairns Esplanade overlooking the shimmering Coral Sea. You’ll be within easy flip-flopping distance of Cairns CBD, the Cairns Convention Centre and the city’s dazzling beaches, and the incredible Great Barrier Reef is just a short boat trip away. If you’d rather stay in, the hotel’s rooftop restaurant and bar, Oak & Vine, serves superb cuisine, and the menu offers a fiery blend of Peruvian and Japanese-inspired dishes, perfectly complemented by exquisite cocktails.

hotels.title: Cairns Five-Star Shangri-La Escape at the Gateway to the Great Barrier Reef
hotels.description: Experience the magic of Tropical North Queensland with its dazzling white-sand beaches and turquoise waters from the world-class Shangri-La The Marina, Cairns, a five-star resort-style escape right on the water. Cairns Esplanade's stylish bars and world-class restaurants are at your fingertips, as is the Reef Fleet Terminal, your gateway to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, Shangri-La The Marina, Cairns has a lagoon-style pool, lush gardens and a health club with state-of-the-art equipment. For gourmands, don't miss The Backyard Restaurant overlooking the waterfront.

hotels.title: Newly Renovated and Re-branded Art Deco Hotel in Heart of Cairns with Outdoor Pool Terrace
hotels.description: Discover the newly renovated and re-branded Benson Hotel, perfectly situated in the heart of Cairns. With its Art Deco-inspired interior, outdoor terrace, and vibrant Benson Bar & Restaurant, the hotel offers a stylish and inviting atmosphere for guests to enjoy. The Benson provides well-appointed rooms, versatile event spaces, and a warm and friendly team, ensuring a welcoming home away from home in the bustling CBD.

hotels.title: Central Cairns Family Resort Moments from the Esplanade with Lagoon-Style Pool & Restaurant
hotels.description: Embrace the Cairns tropics with a stay at this hotel located just a stone's throw from the city's vibrant dining scene, where you can indulge in fresh seafood and local delicacies. The resort is also a short stroll from the bustling Cairns Esplanade, renowned for its lively markets and picturesque boardwalk. The hotel itself boasts a stunning lagoon-style pool, contemporary fitness centre and the relaxed Moku Bar + Grill, serving Pacific island-inspired cuisine.

seo.title: Hotels in Cairns - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Cairns, Australia with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
